attributes.review: I wanted to see what the app was all about but when I tried to download it, it said I had a virus on my phone. I looked up the virus but any time I tried my phone would restart and I not turn on. It eventually downloaded after FOUR days of trying and it wasn’t worth my time. Whenever I opened the app it would shut down and once again restart my phone. This was the only app I could actually open which means I couldn’t go on any other app. Don’t waste you time on this app. Would not recommend.
attributes.title: Absolutely horrible!! Do not get!!!

attributes.review: I tried to like it, I really did. But if I could rate it 0 stars, I would. I opened the app for the first time, and I think it released a racist white supremacist demon into my house. In the middle of the night, I was bombarded with voices whispering racial slurs and “make America great again.” My cat also went berserk!! She scratched my eye out because she became so agitated at the energy and voices in my room🤬I had to go the ER because of it!!!! My medical bills are now through the roof, and I have had to call my local priest to exorcise the spirit from my room. I would not recommend this app to ANYONE. 😡
attributes.title: 😬terrible.

attributes.review:
This app is truly just over rated! How a person rate this 5 stars!? Right when I got the app my phone just immediately started lagging. It was terrible having to put up with! I tried to ignore it even though it was frustrating me, but it just got worse! 

My whole phone just FROZE and I couldn’t be on it around 7 minutes! I shouldn’t of been punished of this! I just wanted to FaceTime my children and see what Kids Bop CD they wanted next! But for this time delayed they already got to their dance practice and I had to wait! This is so horrible!
attributes.title: Unacceptable!

attributes.review: this app is horrible. when i first opened the app there were bugs everywhere! the app was all sticky and not cleaned. and there was also a clown on the front page, i don’t know why but there was. he was orange. the app always glitches and makes me buy all of the circus tickets to see the clown make a speech about why he’s so ignorant and racist! anyways i think that this app is absolutely horrible and someone need to take over the circus and make it great again because the clown working in that circus is not it. have a good day 💗💓💓💞💕💘💝💕💓
attributes.title: Trump 2020 in a garbage can 😍✨💗💓💓💞💕💖💘💘💞

attributes.review: this app is absolutely god awful. as i was trying to download it, my phone kept re starting because the app is way too weak to carry. i have PLENTY of storage for it so i shouldn’t have had a problem. when i FINALLY got it to download the app kept crashing and i couldn’t even do one thing without my ENTIRE PHONE RE STARTING!!!!! this app is absolutely terrible. all i wanted was news and i got a glitching app? terrible. this app should be taken off the app store IMMEDIATELY!!!!! the president is a piece of trash and so is this app. thank you for your time.
attributes.title: another terrible app!

attributes.review: i wanted to download this app to see what my great president was up to🥰 but when i opened the app, it created a vortex and sucked🌪 me in it. i was floating through some weird dimension where trump and his cult kept popping up and telling me “trump 2020🤬” i was terrified. i landed in some weird land where all around me was “trump 2️⃣0️⃣2️⃣0️⃣” signs and maga hats and omg the worst, trumps face everywhere. i saw a building and started walking towards it and when i got there i walked inside. i saw clones standing there chanting “trump” over and over. they saw me then started to chase me, i ran out of there. i kept running 🏃‍♀️ til i came to a dead end and i started to fight them off. wasn’t hard, mostly old ppl. i fought them off and clicked my red heels 👠 3️⃣ times and said “there’s no place like home 🏡” i got sucked out and came home. overall pretty good experience. anyone else 2020❤️
attributes.title: absolutely disgusting

attributes.review: So I downloaded this app to support our lovely president trump 😽 and as soon as I opened this app I was teleported to the TULSA RALLY🙀 I was fine with it at first because I love supporting our amazing president trump but as soon as I got in SOMEONE SPILLED BEER ON ME! I brushed it off and cussed the man out AND THEN HE CALLED ME A SNOWFLAKE! I tried to ignore that as well, after all I have to support my amazing president 😻 but then a Karen pushed me! I didn’t understand but as soon as I fell she accused me of assaulting her 😾 the totally unbiased police officer took her side and then called me CHING CHONG! Now I’m in prison for life 😾I do not recommend this app!!!! Anywho trump 2020 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸
attributes.title: THIS APP SENT ME TO PRISON

attributes.review: When I wanted to download this app, it was very urgent, as my dying father wanted to figure out who would win the election. It took about the entire day to download, and it uses so much data, that I couldn’t even open any other apps. When it downloaded, my father had passed away. I decided to say who was most likely to win at his funeral, but when I opened the app, my phone glitched out, and the phone snapped itself in half!! My mother disowned me because of what happened, so please have it take up less space and take care of the bugs.
attributes.title: Absolutely TERRIBLE!! ^_^

attributes.review: ok so first this app took 27 years to download. then when it finally downloaded, my house got infected with termites and caused my cinnamon toast crunch to develop spiders in it which caused me to lose my hearing. this app also caused my sister to turn into anne frank and go into hiding. and it also caused my pet turtles to sing songs that broke our noses and eyes. since i had already lost my hearing, when i lost my sight, i ultimately turned into hellen keller. the app also made my house collapse which made me and my family to have to move to alaska where we all froze to death and died.
attributes.title: THIS APP TURNED ME INTO HELLEN KELLER

attributes.review: this app is completely infested with viruses and it constantly crashes. it is utterly useless and i had to get a completely new phone because the viruses in the app made it so i could only type “TRUMP 2020” and it sent the same message to all the contacts on my phone. it is absolutely horrible. it even managed to call people, play inappropriate videos, and delete all the pictures on my phone and replaced them with pictures of donald trump!!  i am horrified at how terrible this app is and even more disappointed that it came from our PRESIDENT!!
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!
